article.name: curse
article.contents:
--- class: Thaumaturgist name: Curse school: Curse rank: 1 type: Debilitation brief: Curse an enemy with weakness, clumsiness, or frailty ---
At-will, std, ranged, 1 vitae; you lay a curse upon the subject. Choose one: - Curse of Weakness: subject's attacks and powers inflict half damage. Cha or Str ends. - Clumsiness: when subject takes a move action or uses a power, they must pass a Dex/Int save or else fumble it and fail, falling prone if moving, and losing the power if casting. Dex or Int ends. - Frailty: subject suffers your proficiency bonus as a penalty to AC and all saving throws. Con or Wis ends.
article.bodyHtml:
At-will, std, ranged, 1 vitae; you lay a curse upon the subject. Choose one:

  • Curse of Weakness: subject's attacks and powers inflict half damage. Cha or Str ends.
  • Clumsiness: when subject takes a move action or uses a power, they must pass a Dex/Int save or else fumble it and fail, falling prone if moving, and losing the power if casting. Dex or Int ends.
  • Frailty: subject suffers your proficiency bonus as a penalty to AC and all saving throws. Con or Wis ends.
